vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σκολῐότης, ητος, ἡ,
crookedness, σ. τῆς καμπῆς, of a Parthian bow, [Refs 1st c.AD+]: in plural, the windings of a stream, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; of windings generally, [Refs]
__II metaphorically, inequality, σκολιότητα ἔχειν to be unequally affected, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 of men, crookedness, dishonesty, [LXX]
